Properties.ProtectedString:
--Rescripted by StarWars local Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool.Handle
local Player = nil local Humanoid = nil
local COOL_DOWN = 20 local TRAP_STAND_TIME = 120
local LastClick = 0
local function CreateDartTrap() local DartTrap = Handle:Clone() DartTrap.Name = "DartTrap" DartTrap.Friction = 1 DartTrap.Elasticity = 0 DartTrap.Transparency = 0 DartTrap.CFrame = DartTrap.CFrame + Vector3.new(0, -1, 0) DartTrap.CanCollide = true DartTrap.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) DartTrap.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)
--I don't know how I feel about this, this was from the old script. local BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.Parent = DartTrap
local CreatorObject = Instance.new("ObjectValue") CreatorObject.Value = Player CreatorObject.Name = "creator" CreatorObject.Parent = DartTrap
local DartScript = script.DartScript:Clone() DartScript.Parent = DartTrap DartScript.Disabled = false
Debris:AddItem(DartTrap, TRAP_STAND_TIME) DartTrap.Parent = workspace
wait(COOL_DOWN) Handle.Transparency = 0 end
local function OnActivated() if not Player then return end if not Humanoid then return end if tick() - COOL_DOWN > LastClick and Humanoid.Health > 0 then LastClick = tick() CreateDartTrap() end end
local function OnEquipped() Player = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Tool.Parent) Humanoid = Tool.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") end
local function OnUnequipped() Player = nil Humanoid = nil end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(OnUnequipped) Tool.Activated:connect(OnActivated)

--Rescripted by StarWars local Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local DartTrap = script.Parent
local CHECK_RATE = 0.1 local FIRE_RATE = 3 local RANGE = 100 local DAMAGE = 45
local WIND_VECTOR = Vector3.new(2, -1, 1).Unit local RATE = 1/20
local Creator = DartTrap:WaitForChild("creator")
local function DrawBeam(startPosition, endPosition, brickColor, fadeDelay) local Distance = (startPosition - endPosition).Magnitude local Laser = Instance.new("Part") Laser.Name = "Effect" Laser.Anchored = true Laser.CanCollide = false Laser.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) Laser.Transparency = 1 Laser.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic Laser.Locked = true Laser.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Laser.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Laser.BrickColor = brickColor Laser.CFrame = CFrame.new(endPosition, startPosition) * CFrame.new(0, 0, -Distance * 0.5) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi * 0.5, 0, 0) local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, Distance*5, 1) Mesh.Parent = Laser Debris:AddItem(Laser, fadeDelay*3)
Laser.Parent = workspace local Frames = math.floor(fadeDelay / RATE) for i = 1, Frames do wait(RATE) local Percent = i / Frames Laser.CFrame = Laser.CFrame + WIND_VECTOR * RATE Laser.Transparency = 0.5 + (Percent * 0.5) end
wait(1) Laser:Destroy() end
local function FireDart(hit, position) local Dart = Instance.new("Part") Dart.Name = "Effect" Dart.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Reddish brown") Dart.CanCollide = false Dart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Dart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Dart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.4, 1.6)
local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshId = "rbxassetid://90114680" Mesh.TextureId = "rbxassetid://90023594" Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) Mesh.Parent = Dart
local DartCFrame = CFrame.new(position, position + DartTrap.CFrame.lookVector) * CFrame.new(0, 0, 0.5) Dart.CFrame = DartCFrame
local Weld = Instance.new("Weld") Weld.Part0 = hit Weld.Part1 = Dart Weld.C0 = hit.CFrame:inverse() * DartCFrame Weld.C1 = DartCFrame:inverse() * DartCFrame Weld.Parent = Dart
Debris:AddItem(Dart, 10) Dart.Parent = workspace
local Sound = DartTrap:FindFirstChildOfClass("Sound") if Sound then Sound:Play() end spawn(function() DrawBeam(DartTrap.Position, position, BrickColor.new("Institutional white"), 0.25) end) wait(FIRE_RATE - CHECK_RATE) end
local function CheckInTangible(hit) if hit then if hit.Transparency > 0.8 or hit.Name == "Handle" or hit.Name == "Effect" or hit.Name == "Bullet" or hit.Name == "Laser" or string.lower(hit.Name) == "water" or hit.Name == "Rail" or hit.Name == "Arrow" then return true end end
return false end
local function CastRay(startPosition, vector, length, ignore) local Hit, EndPosition = workspace:FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(startPosition, vector*length), ignore) if Hit then if CheckInTangible(Hit) then Hit, EndPosition = CastRay(EndPosition + (vector*0.01), vector, length-((startPosition - EndPosition).Magnitude), ignore) end end
return Hit, EndPosition end
while true do wait(CHECK_RATE) local Hit, Position = CastRay(DartTrap.Position, DartTrap.CFrame.lookVector, RANGE, DartTrap) if Hit and Hit.Parent then local TargetHumanoid = Hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if TargetHumanoid and TargetHumanoid.Health > 0 then local HitPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hit.Parent) if Creator.Value ~= HitPlayer then TargetHumanoid:TakeDamage(DAMAGE) FireDart(Hit, Position) end end end end

--Rescripted by StarWars local Player = game.Players.LocalPlayer local COOL_DOWN = 20 local LastClick = 0
local function OnEquipped(mouse) if mouse then if tick() - COOL_DOWN > LastClick then mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" wait(LastClick - (tick() - COOL_DOWN)) mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" else mouse.Icon="rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" end
mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() if tick() - COOL_DOWN > LastClick and mouse.Target and mouse.Hit then local Character = Player.Character if Character then local Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if Humanoid and Humanoid.Health > 0 then LastClick = tick() mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" end end end end) end end
script.Parent.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped)
